reviewText: My children loved the McGee and Me series when they were young. I am sad that it is so hard to find the series on DVDs.
So happy with these. Worth every penny!
Wonderful cartoon/reality dvd of real life issues and how to deal with it in a Christian way. ages 6 and up

We got this as a part of the original TBN four pack. This one is our favorite. the Twister and Shout episode is really good when the kids are stuck in a tornado without their parents and turn to God for strength to get through. Its a great lesson, and my five year old and I watch it a lot. It is one of our favorites.  The one we had is broken, so we ordered it again used. I have not got it yet, but hoping it works well.  It was worth paying almost $10 for a used one.
